blogPost.excerpt: Smoothly prepared for Food Intolerance and Vegan Diets. Tasty and healthy smoothie recipes. It serves easy, gluten-free, lactose-free and nut-free recipes for users keen on their health.
blogPost.body: Smoothly prepared for Food Intolerance and Vegan Diets. Tasty and healthy smoothie recipes. It serves easy, gluten-free, lactose-free and nut-free recipes for users keen on their health.
blogPost.title: Smoothly - Food intolerance and vegan diet recipes
blogPost.author: Oktay ELİPEK

localize.description: 为食物不耐受和素食者准备的冰沙。美味和健康的冰沙食谱。它为热衷于健康的用户提供简单、无麸质、无乳糖和无坚果的食谱。
localize.tagline: 食物不耐受和素食食谱

localize.description: 爲食物不耐受和素食者準備的冰沙。美味和健康的冰沙食譜。它爲熱衷於健康的用戶提供簡單、無麩質、無乳糖和無堅果的食譜。
localize.tagline: 食物不耐受和素食食譜

previous.excerpt: Timedash combines your most vital daily information in one nifty widget: time, date, weather & a daily step counter, all available in one clear overview. Carefully designed with lots of attention to detail, Timedash is a must have widget for your Home Screen!
previous.title: Timedash Widget - Combines your vital daily information into one nifty widget

localize.description: Timedash将您最重要的日常信息整合到一个小工具中：时间、日期、天气和每日步数，所有这些都在一个清晰的概述中提供。精心设计，注重细节，Timedash是你的主屏幕必备的小工具。
localize.tagline: 将您的重要日常信息整合到一个精美的小工具中

localize.description: Timedash將您最重要的日常信息整合到一個小工具中：時間、日期、天氣和每日步數，所有這些都在一個清晰的概述中提供。精心設計，注重細節，Timedash是你的主屏幕必備的小工具。
localize.tagline: 將您的重要日常信息整合到一個精美的小工具中

next.excerpt: ProApp is a place to learn all things Design. It's your Digital Design College to learn various Design disciplines with bite-sized content on the go. We launched with 30+ courses - UI/UX design, HCI, Mobile & Web Design, Typography, Microcopy, & many more.
next.title: ProApp Learn Design - Learn the foundations of design principles

localize.description: ProApp是一个学习设计的地方。它是你的数字设计学院，让你在旅途中学习各种设计学科与比特大小的内容。我们推出了30多门课程--UI/UX设计，人机交互，移动和网页设计，字体设计，微电影，以及更多。
ProApp是一個學習設計的地方。它是你的數字設計學院，讓你在旅途中學習各種設計學科與比特大小的內容。我們推出了30多門課程--UI/UX設計，人機交互，移動和網頁設計，字體設計，微電影，以及更多。
